library.name: Skills Library
library.description: Central catalog of all available skills that bots can use. Human-curated only.

data-extraction.description: Skills for extracting data from external sources

billing.description: Financial and billing capabilities (Stripe, cost calculation, invoicing)

ai-models.description: AI model integration and calling (Gemini, Claude)

security.description: Security and access control (credentials, entitlements, permissions)

usage_instructions.for_bots: Before implementing any major capability, search this catalog by keyword. If the capability exists, use it. If not, request it be added.
usage_instructions.search_example: Search for 'sms' to find SMS-related capabilities
usage_instructions.checkout_process: 1. Search catalog, 2. Find matching skill, 3. Load capability, 4. Use it, 5. Return when done
